channel.title: Andriy Koval on Ken Moselle
channel.description: Recent content in Andriy Koval on Ken Moselle

item.title: Target Information Architecture
item.description: We argue that a developed Target Information Architecture (TIA) is a necessary condition to guide the translation of health service analytics back into a health service system.

item.title: “Real-world” de-identification of highdimensional transactional health datasets
item.description: This paper presents a framework for addressing data access challenges associated with secondary use of high-dimensional transactional datasets that have been extracted from electronic health/medical records (EHRs).
